Here's a healthy thought. :)

docs.title: Welcome to New Games Integration Page

docs.text:
Implementing Authentication


Before a player can perform any actions they need to authenticate with the Platform. This document describes the login sequence to authenticate a player with the Platform, and contains a description of how to:




Create an authenticated session.


Validate this session.


Get inventory data.


Create Auth Token and Remember Me Token.




Any API request is signed with an API Key, which is provided during the title registration in the Game Management Tool. Contact the Platform Team to obtain the API Key.





WGNI 
 API Gateway Method


At this stage 3PP games use a hybrid authentication model via WGNI and API Gateway described below.


Assuming that the Partner Team has the API Key, the following sequence takes place:




Login via WGNI and API Gateway using Auth Token for the first login.


Login via API Gateway using Remember Me Token for all subsequent login instances.




Each title version has a specific API key to ensure version distinction.


Login via WGNI and API Gateway. Auth Token


The diagram below describes the initial login process:




Get Auth Token via WGNI.


Authenticate and validate session in the Platform.


Get/sync account inventory data.


(Optional) Get Remember Me Token.


(Optional) Get additional Auth Token for XMPPCS.






Getting Auth Token via WGNI


Authentication via WGNI is a two-step procedure:




Client starts a built-in HTTP-server and opens WGNI page in a system web-browser.


Client receives a request to a built-in web-server from WGNI, which includes authentication credentials (
wgid
 and 
auth_token
).




Note:

The attached Python file is a reference for WGNI implemention. Request the latest version of the file and valid 
WGNI_URL
 and 
SPA_URL
 from the Platform Team.


WGNI_URL
 — link to a web authentication page where a user logs in.


SPA_URL
 — S2S back-end API where server requests are sent to.


API Requests


The following requests are used to authenticate a player and synchronize the catalog.








Method


Gateway


Description










loginWithAuthToken


Auth


Creates an authenticated session for the user from an Auth Token.






validateClientSession


Server


Returns the 
profile_id
 associated with the 
client_session
 token.






getFullInventory


Server


Gets profile's and its children's entitlements and virtual currency balances.






getFullInventoryFromSession


Server


Batch operation combining 
validateClientSession
 and 
getFullInventory
.






getPurchaseStatusByOrderId


Server


Gets status of a purchase by Order Id.










Login via API Gateway. Remember Me Token


The diagram below describes a login sequence with Remember Me Token from 
loginWithAuthToken
.




API Requests


The following request is used to authenticate a player with a Remember Me Token.








Method


Gateway


Description










loginWithRememberMe


Auth


Creates an authenticated session from a Remember Me Token.

docs.title: API Requests

docs.text:
Platform API


Wargaming Network Platform provides a simple and consistent interface into the platform with patterns familiar to developers. API gateways serve as a single entry point into the system making the integration process easier, without any need to learn the underlying technologies.


Wargaming Network Platform can be accessed through the following API Gateways:




Authentication API


Server API


Client API (coming 2017)






Try these APIs in Swagger:




Auth API


Server API






Auth APIs


API requests used for player authentication.


loginWithAuthToken


This request is SERVER ONLY. Creates an authenticated user session from an Auth Token obtained from WGNI.


Request URL


POST
 
https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/auth/api/v1/loginWithAuthToken


Request Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
region
: 
na
,
    
auth_token
: 
JC0yZReLvfQPi76y2F5A4Q
,
    
wgid
: 18414499,
    
fingerprint
: 
a5d1cf90-f38c-4775-80cd-84e3fb76b509
,
    
create_remember_me
: true,
    
client_ip
: 
178.172.239.244
,
    
auth_token_target_application
: 
xmppcs

  }
}




Curl


curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 
'Accept: application/json' --header 
'x-freya-server-api-key: test' -d '{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
region
: 
na
,
    
auth_token
: 
JC0yZReLvfQPi76y2F5A4Q
,
    
wgid
: 18414499,
    
fingerprint
: 
a5d1cf90-f38c-4775-80cd-84e3fb76b509
,
    
create_remember_me
: true,
    
client_ip
: 
178.172.239.244
,
    
auth_token_target_application
: 
xmppcs

  }
}' 'https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/auth/api/v1/loginWithAuthToken'






Parameters








Name


Description


Type










x-freya-server-api-key


Authentication API key.


string






message_id


For tracking or debugging purposes. Returns back in the response.


string, optional






region


SPA region.


string, optional






auth_token


Wargaming Auth Token.


string






wgid


Wargaming Account ID.


int






fingerprint


A unique device fingerprint that stays consistent for a given user and device.


string, optional






create_remember_me


Boolean indicating if a Remember Me Token should be created.


boolean, optional






client_ip


Client IP address.


boolean, optional






auth_token_target_application


If not null, will create Auth Token for specified application.


string, optional








Response Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
success
: true,
    
result_message
: null,
    
result_code
: null,
    
profile_id
: 93503539,
    
nickname
: 
Player1990
,
    
client_session
: 
salAzJiufFWCCT3rXiA79A
,
    
client_gateway
: null,
    
remember_me
: 
2:4758258918403912621:77218061794558285652020638946378270086
,
    
auth_token
: 
65079312
,
    
wgid
: 18414499
    
first_login
: false,
    
restrictions
: [],
    
pending_order_id
: 
0

  } }




While most of the response values are self-explanatory, some may need clarification.




client_session
 — Client session token.


first_login
 — Indicates whether this login instance is the first ever for this player.


restrictions
 — If not empty, provides the details of player's restrictions (for example, bans).


pending_order_id
 — Initial Inventory Order ID. 0 if order is complete or there is no initial inventory. If non-zero — use 
getPurchaseStatusByOrderId
.






loginWithEmail


This request is SERVER ONLY. Creates an authenticated session for the user using email and password.


Request URL


POST
 
https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/auth/api/v1/loginWithEmail


Request Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
a38a87f2-27f1-4962-9262-fa540051da1a

  },
  
body
: {
    
fingerprint
: 
a5d1cf90-f38c-4775-80cd-84e3fb76b509
,
    
region
: 
ru
,
    
email
: 
player@wargaming.net
,
    
password
: 
Player1990
,
    
create_remember_me
: true,
    
client_ip
: 
178.172.239.244
,
    
auth_token_target_application
: 
xmppcs

  }
}




Curl


curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 
'x-freya-server-api-key: test' -d '{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
a38a87f2-27f1-4962-9262-fa540051da1a

  },
  
body
: {
    
fingerprint
: 
a5d1cf90-f38c-4775-80cd-84e3fb76b509
,
    
region
: 
ru
,
    
email
: 
player@wargaming.net,
    
password
: 
Player1990
,
    
create_remember_me
: true,
    
client_ip
: 
178.172.239.244
,
    
auth_token_target_application
: 
xmppcs

  }
}' 'https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/auth/api/v1/loginWithEmail'






Parameters








Name


Description


Type










x-freya-server-api-key


Authentication API key.


string






message_id


For tracking/debugging purposes. Returns back in the response.


string, optional






fingerprint


A unique device fingerprint that stays consistent for a given user and device.


string, optional






region


SPA region.


string, optional






email


Wargaming account email address.


string






password


Wargaming account password.


string






create_remember_me


Indicates if a Remember Me Token should be created.


boolean, optional






client_ip


Client IP address.


boolean, optional






auth_token_target_application


If non-zero, creates an Auth Token for a specified application.


string, optional








Response Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
a38a87f2-27f1-4962-9262-fa540051da1a

  },

: true,
    
profile_id
: 72339069014644105,
    
nickname
: 
Player1990
,
    
client_session
: 
salAzJiufFWCCT3rXiA79A
,
    
remember_me
: 
8589991476:4758258918403912621:77218061794558285652020638946378270086
,
    
auth_token
: 
65079312
,
    
wgid
: 18414499
    
first_login
: false,
    
restrictions
: [],
    
pending_order_id
: 
0

  }
}

This request is SERVER ONLY. Creates an authenticated session from a Remember Me Token.


Request URL


POST
 
https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/auth/api/v1/loginWithRememberMe


Request Sample

81a9f00a-255a-4c90-8cc7-70959464b867
,

: 
na
,
    
remember_me
: 
2:4758258918403912621:77218061794558285652020638946378270086
,
    
client_ip
: 
178.172.239.244
,
    
auth_token_target_application
: 
xmppcs

  }
}

  },

: {
    
fingerprint
: 
81a9f00a-255a-4c90-8cc7-70959464b867
,

: 
na
,

: 
8589991476:4758258918403912621:77218061794558285652020638946378270086
,
    
client_ip
: 
178.172.239.244
,
    
auth_token_target_application
: 
xmppcs

  }
}' 'https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/auth/api/v1/loginWithRememberMe'






Parameters








Name


Description


Type










x-freya-server-api-key


Authentication API key.


string






message_id


For tracking/debugging purposes. Returns back in the response.


string, optional






fingerprint


A unique device fingerprint that stays consistent for a given user and device.


string, optional






region


SPA region.


string, optional






remember_me


Remember Me Token from 
loginWithAuthToken
 or 
loginWithEmail
.


string






client_ip


Client IP address.


boolean, optional






auth_token_target_application


If non-zero, creates an Auth Token for the specified application.


string, optional








Response Sample


{
  
header
: {

: 
1be69abd-be7e-47e9-989e-24b915c509a2

: 
8c4L15neyTW09fI4NkhIhw
,

: 
8589991476:4758258918403912621:77218061794558285652020638946378270086
,
    
auth_token
: 
35878340
,
    
wgid
: 18414499
    
first_login
: false,
    
restrictions
: [],
    
pending_order_id
: 
0

  }
}

docs.text: Wargaming Network Platform provides a simple and consistent interface into the platform with patterns familiar to developers. API gateways serve as a single entry point into the system making the integration process easier, without any need to learn the underlying technologies.  Wargaming Network Platform can be accessed through the following API Gateways:   Authentication API  Server API  Client API (coming 2017)    Try these APIs in Swagger:   Auth API  Server API

docs.text:
Server APIs


API requests used to power game servers.


getFullInventory


Recursively get profile's and its children's entitlements and virtual currency balances.


Request URL


POST
 
https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/server/api/v1/getFullInventory


Request Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
profile_id
: 93503539
  }
}




Curl


curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 
'x-freya-server-api-key: test' -d '{
  
header
: {
  
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
profile_id
: 93503539
  }
}' 'https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/server/api/v1/getFullInventory'






Parameters








Name


Description


Type










x-freya-server-api-key


Authentication API key.


string






message_id


For tracking or debugging purposes. Returns back in the response.


string, optional






profile_id


Profile ID returned during the authentication flow.


int








Response Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
success
: true,
    
result_message
: 
string
,
    
result_code
: 
string
,
    
profile
: {
      
entitlements
: [
        {
          
entitlement_code
: 
regular_repair_kit
,
          
amount
: 2,
          
expiration
: 0
        }
      ],
      
currencies
: [
        {
          
currency_id
: 
gold
,
          
currency_code
: 
1
,
          
amount
: 
1000

        }
      ],
      
profile_id
: 93503539,
      
game_data
: 
Game supplied string when child profile was created.
,
      
children
: [ {} ]
    }
  }
}

fingerprint

21ad5190-228f-440a-a338-ca84606f57c9

}

,
    
fingerprint

21ad5190-228f-440a-a338-ca84606f57c9

  }
}' 'https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/server/api/v1/getFullInventoryFromSession'

getPurchaseStatusByOrderId


Gets status of a purchase by Order Id.


Request URL


POST


https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/server/api/v1/getPurchaseStatusByOrderId


Request Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
order_id
: 
12334561233257
,
    
profile_id
: 93503539
  }
}




Curl


curl -X POST --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 
'x-freya-server-api-key: test' -d '{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
order_id
: 
12334561233257
,
    
profile_id
: 93503539
  }
}' 'https://api-wgie.wargaming.net/server/api/v1/getPurchaseStatusByOrderId'




Parameters








Name


Description


Type










x-freya-server-api-key


Authentication API key.


string






message_id


For tracking or debugging purposes. Returns back in the response.


string, optional






order_id


Original order ID from the purchase.


string






profile_id


Profile ID returned during login.


int










Response Sample


{
  
header
: {
    
message_id
: 
9fb0c554-132d-441c-b32c-1e13929852c0

  },
  
body
: {
    
success
: true,
    
order_id
: 
string
,
    
purchase_status
: 
COMMITTED

  }
}
